content: twistygoo if you re looking for a quick knit of a hat but you want something more interesting than the usual stockinette or ribbed beanie then twistygoo may be for you a spiraling twist of eyelets and textured stitches the pattern will hold your interest without melting your brain directions are written for one size what i would consider to be a woman s average head size 22 head circumference but the sizing is easily modified by adding or subtracting stitches in groups of ten note that the lacy aspect of the hat opens it up thus it has quite a bit of stretch to it and will accommodate a wide range of head sizes as written materials  150 yards worsted weight yarn this is generous yardage the hat shown was made from malabrigo rios in the sunset colorway and used just over half a skein approximately 110 yards  16 circular needle us8/5 0 mm or size necessary to get gauge  us8/5 0 mm dpns or a second us8/5 0 mm circular  stitch marker  tapestry needle 1 twistygoo two together k3tog knit three together directions cast on 90 stitches using long tailed cast on or your favorite stretchy cast on method pm to denote start of round work in 1x1 rib k1 p1 for six rounds begin twistygoo pattern round 1 k2tog yo k3 to end of round round 2 k1 p1 to last 2 stitches k1 slip last stitch directly onto right needle without twisting remove marker slip_stitch back onto left needle again without twisting replace marker repeat these two rounds until hat measures 6 from cast on edge ending with round 2 begin decreases switch to dpns or two circulars as necessary to accommodate decreasing circumference round 1 k2tog yo k1 k2tog to end of round 72 stitches round 2 k1 p1 k1 p2 k1 p1 k1 repeat to last eight stitches k1 p1 k1 p2 k1 p1 slip last stitch directly onto right needle without twisting remove marker slip_stitch back onto left needle again without twisting replace marker 2 twistygoo pattern and images © lisa m beamer 2011 this pattern its images and
